Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player.school

Class SchoolRoom

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.StudentsManager
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player.school.SchoolRoom
public class SchoolRoom extends StudentsManager
Models School Room part of the Player's Dashboard, keeping also track of the teachers.
